mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHALLENGE_FORM WHERE resolved = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, ch.* FROM ( SELECT form_no, user_no, ch_title, description, reference, resolved, created_at FROM CHALLENGE_FORM WHERE resolved = 'N' )ch ORDER BY form_no DESC ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE approval = 'N' AND rcp_no IN ( SELECT ref_no FROM LIKES WHERE ref_type = 'RECIPE' AND like_status = 'LIKE' GROUP BY ref_no HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ) )+( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING (report_type) WHERE resolved = 'N' AND category = 'RECIPE' ) FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING (report_type) WHERE resolved = 'N' AND category = 'USERS'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT report_no, user_no, category, detail, ref_no, content, reported_at FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING (report_type) WHERE resolved = 'N' AND category = 'USERS' ) u ORDER BY report_no ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING (report_type) WHERE resolved = 'N' AND category NOT IN ('RECIPE', 'USERS')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, c.* FROM ( SELECT report_no, user_no, category, detail, ref_no, content, reported_at FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING (report_type) WHERE resolved = 'N' AND category NOT IN ('RECIPE', 'USERS') )c ORDER BY report_no ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT room_no AS roomNo, username AS className, 'admin' AS type, 'Y' AS notification FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE JOIN USERS USING (user_no) WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT M.message_no, M.msg_type, M.ref_no, M.time as createdAt, M.hidden, M.image_no, M.user_no, U.username, M.content, M.ref_no as roomNo FROM MESSAGE M JOIN USERS U ON U.user_no = M.user_no WHERE M.ref_no = #{refNo} AND M.msg_type = #{msgType} ORDER BY M.time

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT u.user_no, u.username, u.status, NVL(b.banDays, 0) AS banDays, NVL(r.reportNo, 0) AS reportNo, NVL(rcp.officialRcp, 0) AS officialRcp, NVL(c.chRequest, 0) AS chRequest FROM USERS u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_no, SUM(end_date - start_date) AS banDays FROM USER_BANNED GROUP BY user_no ) b ON u.user_no = b.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_no, COUNT(*) AS reportNo FROM REPORT GROUP BY user_no ) r ON u.user_no = r.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_no, COUNT(*) AS officialRcp FROM RECIPE WHERE approval = 'Y' GROUP BY user_no ) rcp ON u.user_no = rcp.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_no, COUNT(*) AS chRequest FROM CHALLENGE_FORM GROUP BY user_no ) c ON u.user_no = c.user_no WHERE u.user_no > 0 ) u ORDER BY u.user_no ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM USERS
SELECT count(*) FROM RECIPE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT R.rcp_no, R.rcp_name, R.views, R.approval, NVL(L.likes, 0) AS likes, NVL(D.dislikes, 0) AS dislikes, NVL(B.bookmarks, 0) AS bookmarks FROM RECIPE R LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ref_no, COUNT(*) AS likes FROM LIKES WHERE ref_type = 'RECIPE' AND like_status = 'LIKE' GROUP BY ref_no ) L ON R.rcp_no = L.ref_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ref_no, COUNT(*) AS dislikes FROM LIKES WHERE ref_type = 'RECIPE' AND like_status = 'DISLIKE' GROUP BY ref_no ) D ON R.rcp_no = D.ref_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ref_no, COUNT(*) AS bookmarks FROM BOOKMARK WHERE rcp_source = 'COMM' GROUP BY ref_no ) B ON R.rcp_no = B.ref_no ORDER BY R.rcp_no ) u ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD) + (SELECT count(*) FROM MARKETPLACE) + (SELECT count(*) FROM CHALLENGE) FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT 'board' AS category, B.board_no AS commNo, B.title, U.username, B.created_at, B.views, NVL(L.likes, 0) AS likes FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.user_no = U.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ref_no, COUNT(*) AS likes FROM LIKES WHERE ref_type = 'BOARD' GROUP BY ref_no ) L ON B.board_no = L.ref_no
UNION ALL
SELECT 'market' AS category, M.product_id AS commNo, M.title, U.username, M.created_at, M.views, 0 AS likes FROM MARKETPLACE M JOIN USERS U ON M.user_no = U.user_no
UNION ALL
SELECT 'challenge' AS category, C.challenge_no AS commNo, CI.title, U.username, C.created_at, C.views, NVL(L.likes, 0) AS likes FROM CHALLENGE C JOIN USERS U ON C.user_no = U.user_no JOIN CHALLENGE_INFO CI ON C.CH_INFO_NO = CI.CH_INFO_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ref_no, COUNT(*) AS likes FROM LIKES WHERE ref_type = 'CHALLENGE' GROUP BY ref_no ) L ON C.challenge_no = L.ref_no ORDER BY 5, 2 ) T ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT CK.room_no, CK.class_name, U.username, CK.passcode, NVL(CE.numPpl, 0) AS numPpl, CK.delete_status FROM COOKING_CLASS CK JOIN USERS U ON CK.user_no = U.user_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_no, COUNT(*) AS numPpl FROM CLASS_ENROLL GROUP BY room_no ) CE ON CK.room_no = CE.room_no ORDER BY 5, 1 ) T ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM COOKING_CLASS

SELECT C.room_no, C.class_name, M.message_no, C.user_no, U.username, M.content, M.time, M.hidden, M.image_no FROM COOKING_CLASS C LEFT JOIN USERS U ON C.user_no = U.user_no LEFT JOIN MESSAGE M ON C.room_no = M.ref_no WHERE M.msg_type = 'CCLASS' AND C.room_no = #{roomNo} ORDER BY M.time

SELECT C.room_no, U.username AS class_name, M.message_no, C.user_no, UU.username, M.content, M.time, M.hidden, M.image_no FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE C LEFT JOIN USERS U ON C.user_no = U.user_no LEFT JOIN MESSAGE M ON C.room_no = M.ref_no JOIN USERS UU ON M.user_no = UU.user_no WHERE M.msg_type = 'CSERVICE' AND C.room_no = #{roomNo} ORDER BY M.time
SELECT count(*) FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE

SELECT room_no, user_no, username, time, content FROM ( SELECT C.room_no, C.user_no, U.username, M.time, M.content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C.room_no ORDER BY M.time DESC) AS rn FROM CUSTOMER_SERVICE C JOIN USERS U ON C.user_no = U.user_no LEFT JOIN MESSAGE M ON C.message_no = M.message_no ) WHERE rn = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM ANNOUNCEMENT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT ancmt_no, content, start_date, end_date FROM ANNOUNCEMENT ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date DESC ) u ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM CHALLENGE_INFO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, u.* FROM ( SELECT ch_info_no, title, start_date, end_date, image_no FROM CHALLENGE_INFO ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date DESC ) u ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT image_no FROM CHALLENGE_INFO WHERE ch_info_no = #{chInfoNo}
SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM ING_METHOD) + (SELECT count(*) FROM ING_PAIR) FROM DUAL
